Name: Bobby De Niro
Ingredients: 7.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: STIR jam with gin until jam is dissolved. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: An apricot flavoured twist on the classic Casino cocktail.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2008 at Westbourne House, London, England.
